title: Strengthening Social Leadership Competencies through Museum-Based Remote PBL

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: Social sector project implementation for corporate managers/leaders utilizing museum remote education resources

learning_goals: Analyze museum digital content using remote collaboration tools to explain the historical context of social change
Collaborate with museum experts to design and implement PBL (Project-Based Learning) tasks centered on cultural heritage
Produce team-based reports proposing solutions to social issues using digital archive materials as a foundation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
